'''Lunar New Year Skin Pack'''<ref>{{Tweet|Minecraft|964514706563137537|Happy Chinese New Year, friends! It’s the year of the dog! Wolves are a bit like dogs so it’s still relevant to our video game. Celebrate by downloading the Lunar Skin pack!}}</ref> is a [[skin pack]] celebrating the [[w:Lunar New Year|Lunar New Year]], featuring six skins themed after Chinese culture. At some point, it was delisted.
